name: fuskr
description: Fuskr is an extension for Google Chrome which allows users to create image galleries from a single image based on their filename.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run sync:version && npm run test:ci && npm run build:extensions
scripts.build:extensions: npm run build:angular && npm run build:background && npm run copy:files && npm run organise:builds && npm run zip:builds
scripts.build:angular: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" ng build --configuration production && ng build --configuration production --output-path=dist/firefox
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true})"
scripts.copy:files: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.cpSync('src/_locales', 'dist/chromium/_locales', {recursive: true}); fs.cpSync('src/_locales', 'dist/firefox/_locales', {recursive: true}); fs.copyFileSync('src/manifest-firefox.json', 'dist/firefox/manifest.json'); fs.copyFileSync('dist/chromium/fuskr-core.js', 'dist/firefox/fuskr-core.js')"
scripts.organise:builds: node src/build/organise-build.js dist/chromium && node src/build/organise-build.js dist/firefox
scripts.zip:builds: node src/build/zip-build.js dist/chromium dist/fuskr-chromium.zip && node src/build/zip-build.js dist/firefox dist/fuskr-firefox.zip

author: Dan Atkinson and Jonathon Bolster
